message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. It is an exceptional opportunity that we believe could greatly benefit you. We are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950000. This is a limited-time offer, so please let us know if you are interested.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of that, we would like to counter your offer with a price of $900000. This is our best offer, and we hope it aligns more closely with your expectations while still providing a fair return for our company.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $900000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $850000. This is my best and final offer.

We appreciate your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, we have decided to adjust our price to $875000. This is our final offer, reflecting a compromise that we believe will be beneficial for both parties.

I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price, but $875000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm sticking to my previous counteroffer of $850000. I'm confident that this is a fair price for the product, and I'm willing to walk away if you're not willing to meet me at this price.
